"Eco Chic": A fashion line that uses sustainable materials and ethical production practices to create stylish clothing for conscious consumers.
"The Modern Vintage": A collection inspired by vintage styles but updated with modern twists and silhouettes.
"Artisanal Wear": A line featuring handmade, one-of-a-kind pieces created by local artisans from around the world.
"Glam Rock": A bold and edgy fashion line featuring statement pieces and rock-inspired designs.
"Nostalgic Nostalgia": A collection inspired by nostalgia for past decades, with classic silhouettes and playful prints.
